                        This field can be set to a minimum of 5 minutes.

properties.label: P_NO_DAYS
properties.name: P_NO_DAYS
properties.hint: Defaults to nil if not supplied.

input.sql:
--  Code developed by SIPAWAR
-- Reference code: "XXRH_ERP_LAPTOP_FULL_PKG"
SELECT SNOW_TICKET_NUM,
             SNOW_BUSINESS_GROUP,
             OU_NAME,
             PR_LINE_NUMBER,
             PR_NUMBER,
             PR_CREATION_DATE,
             PR_AMOUNT,
             PR_CURRENCY,
             PR_STATUS,
             PR_DESCRIPTION,
             PR_COMPANY_CODE,
             PR_ACCOUNT_CODE,
             PR_LOCATION_CODE,
             PR_COST_CENTER,
             PR_PROJECT_CODE,
             VENDOR_NAME,
             PR_APPROVED_BY,
             APPROVED_DATE,
             PO_NUMBER,
             PO_DATE,
             PO_AMOUNT,
             RECPT_NUM, 
             RECPT_DATE,
             RECPT_AMOUNT, 
             INVOICE_NUM,
             INVOICE_DATE,
             INVOICE_AMOUNT,
             INV_CREATION_DATE,
             INV_PAY_DATE, 
             INV_STATUS 
        FROM (SELECT XXLFS.SNOW_TICKET_NUM,
                     XXLFS.SNOW_BUSINESS_GROUP,
                     XXLFS.OU_NAME,
                     XXLFS.PR_LINE_NUMBER,
                     XXLFS.PR_NUMBER PR_NUMBER,
                     TO_CHAR(XXLFS.PR_CREATION_DATE,
                             'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') PR_CREATION_DATE,
                     XXLFS.PR_AMOUNT PR_AMOUNT,
                     XXLFS.PR_CURRENCY PR_CURRENCY,
                     XXLFS.PR_STATUS PR_STATUS,
                     TRIM(XXLFS.PR_DESCRIPTION) PR_DESCRIPTION,
                     XXLFS.PR_COMPANY_CODE PR_COMPANY_CODE,
                     XXLFS.PR_ACCOUNT_CODE PR_ACCOUNT_CODE,
                     XXLFS.PR_LOCATION_CODE PR_LOCATION_CODE,
                     XXLFS.PR_COST_CENTER PR_COST_CENTER,
                     XXLFS.PR_PROJECT_CODE PR_PROJECT_CODE,
                     NVL(XXLFS.PR_VENDOR_NAME, XXLFS.PO_VENDOR_NAME) VENDOR_NAME,
                     XXLFS.PR_APPROVED_BY PR_APPROVED_BY,
                     TO_CHAR(XXLFS.PR_APPROVED_DATE,
                             'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') APPROVED_DATE,
                     XXLFS.PO_NUMBER PO_NUMBER,
                     TO_CHAR(XXLFS.PO_CREATION_DATE,
                             'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') PO_DATE,
                     XXLFS.PO_AMOUNT PO_AMOUNT,
                     XXLFS.RECPT_NUM RECPT_NUM, 
                     TO_CHAR(XXLFS.RECPT_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') RECPT_DATE, 
                     XXLFS.RECPT_AMOUNT RECPT_AMOUNT,    
                     XXLFS.INVOICE_NUM INVOICE_NUM,
                     TO_CHAR(XXLFS.INVOICE_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') INVOICE_DATE,
                     XXLFS.INVOICE_AMOUNT INVOICE_AMOUNT,
                     TO_CHAR(XXLFS.INV_CREATION_DATE,
                             'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') INV_CREATION_DATE,
                     TO_CHAR(XXLFS.INV_PAY_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') INV_PAY_DATE, 
                     XXLFS.INV_STATUS INV_STATUS         
                FROM XXRHFIN.XXRHFIN_LAPTOP_FULFILL_SNOW XXLFS
               WHERE 1 = 1
                 AND (XXLFS.PR_CREATION_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - :P_NO_DAYS AND
                     SYSDATE OR XXLFS.PR_LAST_UPDATE_DATE BETWEEN
                     SYSDATE - :P_NO_DAYS AND SYSDATE OR
                     XXLFS.PO_CREATION_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - :P_NO_DAYS AND
                     SYSDATE OR XXLFS.INV_CREATION_DATE BETWEEN
                     SYSDATE - :P_NO_DAYS AND SYSDATE)
                 AND EXISTS (SELECT XXLFS2.REQUISITION_LINE_ID
                        FROM XXRHFIN.XXRHFIN_LAPTOP_FULFILL_SNOW XXLFS2
                       WHERE 1 = 1
                         AND ((XXLFS2.INV_CREATION_DATE BETWEEN
                             SYSDATE - :P_NO_DAYS AND SYSDATE) OR
                             XXLFS.INV_CREATION_DATE IS NULL)
                         AND XXLFS2.REQUISITION_LINE_ID =
                             XXLFS.REQUISITION_LINE_ID))
               ORDER BY PR_NUMBER, PR_LINE_NUMBER
